name: v0.6.1
body:
See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.6.1")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "cef7fd594645a72af17e6748cd0e47743720632ce5c0e9f6b640cce0d185eeb3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.6.1",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/releases/download/v0.6.1/rules_pycross-v0.6.1.tar.gz",
)

# change this to something that works in your environment.
load("@python//3.12.0:defs.bzl", python_interpreter = "interpreter")

load("@rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter)
```


## What's Changed
* feat: Implement  UV lock translator by @ewianda in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/106
* feat: Add default dependencies fields by @ewianda in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/108


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "149ec8b3d353212b8a74ca126eaca27516f1c409a5d01d0215313698d53a7d9d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_pycross-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

# change this to something that works in your environment.
load("@python//3.12.0:defs.bzl", python_interpreter = "interpreter")

load("@rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter)
```


## What's Changed
* feat: expose package_annotations by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/96
* feat(bzlmod): mark lock_import and lock_repos as reproducible by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/99
* Bump repairwheel to 0.3.1 and pass the new --no-sys-paths param by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/102


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.4
body:
See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.5.4")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "a2aa4921a09ba749459b8e47580f259f36efc8b0763d7e2420590d73e7306f13",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.5.4",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/releases/download/v0.5.4/rules_pycross-v0.5.4.tar.gz",
)

# change this to something that works in your environment.
load("@python//3.12.0:defs.bzl", python_interpreter = "interpreter")

load("@rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: Remove + signs from repo name to handle torch+cu112 version naming by @ewianda in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/91
* fix: Don't generate pyc files on installation by @ewianda in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/92
* Fix e2e tests by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/94
* Add all_whl_requirements similar to rules_python by @ewianda in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/93


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.5.3...v0.5.4

name: v0.5.3
body:
See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.5.3")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "ae1ee76d6bd78c43a5036426da0f81a017c740d1dfa57dece8d3775968718b36",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.5.3",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/releases/download/v0.5.3/rules_pycross-v0.5.3.tar.gz",
)

# change this to something that works in your environment.
load("@python//3.12.0:defs.bzl", python_interpreter = "interpreter")

load("@rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter)
```


## What's Changed
* Fix local_wheels in repo context by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/80
* Mark toolchain exec and target interpreter targets as such by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/81
* Fix compatibility with rules_python 0.31+ by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/82
* Accomodate PDM monorepo setups by @plobsing in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/67
* Fix canonical repo names for Bazel 7.1 by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/88
* fix: Add imports to allow experimental_python_import_all_repositories by @ewianda in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/86

## New Contributors
* @plobsing made their first contribution in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/67
* @ewianda made their first contribution in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/86

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3

name: v0.5.2
body:
See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.5.2")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "cfa3cdc7ce8b224f19fad68f29af2478fa680aed7a42435b0ab2bdcda4d72b9f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.5.2",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/releases/download/v0.5.2/rules_pycross-v0.5.2.tar.gz",
)

# change this to something that works in your environment.
load("@python//3.12.0:defs.bzl", python_interpreter = "interpreter")

load("@rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter)
```

## What's Changed
* dev/fix smoke test cache by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/73
* Fix toolchain resolution issue when default version < requested version in lexicographical order by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/74
* Adds requirements.bzl to lock_repo by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/75
* Rename tests/smoke* -> e2e/ by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/76
* Use GLIBC 2.28 as default by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/77
* Fix toolchain config when default python version is X.Y instead of X.Y.Z by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/78


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.5.1")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "edc0ccb8b95a0064f130fa3e7f5d690af9f120243cab72858a265738847e3d51",
```

## What's Changed

## New Contributors
* @ahans made their first contribution in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/71

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

name: v0.5.0
body:
See the [changelog](CHANGELOG.md).

## Using Bzlmod:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pycross", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pycross",
    sha256 = "f16b985a9eb7cf3258d78f07662d052c42b8270d424e5bc85e7a52bd670991d2",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_pycross-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

# change this to something that works in your environment.
load("@python//3.12.0:defs.bzl", python_interpreter = "interpreter")

load("@rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter)
```

## What's Changed
* Self-hosted dependencies (pycross using pycross) by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/53
* Update pre-commit config and run across the codebase. by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/54
* Rewrite the PDM translator to not depend on PDM by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/56
* Fix support for default python version when using pycross_register_for_python_toolchains by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/57
* Support lock generation in WORKSPACE by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/58
* Use the official pre-commit actions by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/60
* fix: pdm translator fails to resolve dependency if pre-release version is required by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/59
* jvolkman_rules_pycross -> rules_pycross by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/62
* Remove target_environment from toolchain by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/64
* bzl_lock_generator refactoring by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/65
* Lock model tweaks by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/66
* :tada: bzlmod support by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/68
* Tweaks for BCR by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/69


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.4...v0.5.0

```
http_archive(
    name = "jvolkman_rules_pycross",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/archive/refs/tags/v0.4.tar.gz",
    sha256 = "ca98a1ed766b6052d40fc4340b5abc56e32b081dea5b228e55ea0bf83d72c550",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.4",
)

load("@jvolkman_rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies()

# Or, if you're using a hermetic toolchain:
#   rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter_target = interpreter)
```

## What's Changed
* Fixes a regression introduced in 0.3.
* Lock generator refactoring by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/52


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.3...v0.4

```
http_archive(
    name = "jvolkman_rules_pycross",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/archive/refs/tags/v0.3.tar.gz",
    sha256 = "ec150d5fe4dabd9dad6dea71a7ead3d491ce37221f310b5c161ad18e70e31e4b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.3",
)

load("@jvolkman_rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies()

# Or, if you're using a hermetic toolchain:
#   rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter_target = interpreter)
```

## What's Changed
* Pdm 2.10.0 by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/45
* [Easy] Fixed wheel builder bug. by @eaplatanios in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/44
* Better support for complex wheel builds by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/48
* feat: add `package_ignore_dependencies` option by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/49
* Better toolchain/environment setup, and integration tests by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/51

## New Contributors
* @eaplatanios made their first contribution in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/44

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/v0.2...v0.3

```
http_archive(
    name = "jvolkman_rules_pycross",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/archive/refs/tags/v0.2.tar.gz",
    sha256 = "5b51cfa4890d6de29b6a0976248e8139f69354bf29924308093a039d93ab630f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.2",
)

load("@jvolkman_rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies()

# Or, if you're using a hermetic toolchain:
#   rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter_target = interpreter)
```

## What's Changed
* Fix leaking __PYVENV_LAUNCHER__ by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/23
* Experimental wheel cross-compilation by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/24
* Introduce absl-py and use flag files by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/25
* Support a newer version of poetry, and downgrade the import usage to â€¦ by @ianoc in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/27
* dev/absolutize flags by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/28
* fix: normalize package-name from pdm-lockfile by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/29
* feat: add dont-edit comment to lockfile by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/38
* Don't fail when no wheel/sdist is available for a platform by @jvolkman in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/31
* make pdm support compatible with pdm 2.8 by @betaboon in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/40

## New Contributors
* @ianoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/pull/27

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/compare/0.1...v0.2

First "release" ðŸ˜…

```
http_archive(
    name = "jvolkman_rules_pycross",
    url = "https://github.com/jvolkman/rules_pycross/archive/refs/tags/0.1.tar.gz",
    sha256 = "ad261f9240491732166f1db6c02c2f781a00d5cda50eddc7b02d1d40b3b2d7be",
    strip_prefix = "rules_pycross-0.1",
)

load("@jvolkman_rules_pycross//pycross:repositories.bzl", "rules_pycross_dependencies")
rules_pycross_dependencies()

# Or, if you're using a hermetic toolchain:
#   rules_pycross_dependencies(python_interpreter_target = interpreter)
```
